update amall_orderform set addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleteStatus = #{deletestatus,jdbcType=BIT}, finishTime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods_amount = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceType = #{invoicetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payTime = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, refund = #{refund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, refund_type = #{refundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipCode = #{shipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipTime = #{shiptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ship_price = #{shipPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, auto_confirm_email = #{autoConfirmEmail,jdbcType=BIT}, auto_confirm_sms = #{autoConfirmSms,jdbcType=BIT}, transport = #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_order_id = #{outOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ec_id = #{ecId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ci_id = #{ciId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, return_shipCode = #{returnShipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_ec_id = #{returnEcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, return_shipTime = #{returnShiptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, alipayorder_id = #{alipayorderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bean_num = #{beanNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bean_amount = #{beanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM amall_orderform of LEFT JOIN amall_goodscart gc ON gc.of_id = of.id LEFT JOIN amall_goods gs ON gs.gc_id = gc.id WHERE gs.goods_name LIKE #{choices};

select e.area_info as info ,e.trueName as trueNames , e.telephone as telephones , e.province as province ,e.city as city ,e.area as area, d.goods_name as goodsName, d.goods_count as count , b.store_name as stroeName , a.order_id as orderId , c.trueName as trueName , a.addTime as addTime , a.totalPrice as totalPrice , a.order_status as status , a.bean_num as beanNum , a.bean_amount as beanAmout from amall_orderform as a , amall_store as b ,amall_user as c , amall_orderform_item as d , amall_order_address as e where a.user_id =c.id and a.store_id = b.id and a.id=d.order_id and a.addr_id=e.id

select d.goods_name as goodsName, b.store_name as stroeName , a.order_id as orderId , c.trueName as trueName , a.addTime as addTime , d.goods_price as totalPrice , a.order_status as status , a.bean_num as beanNum , a.bean_amount as beanAmount from amall_orderform as a , amall_store as b ,amall_user as c , amall_orderform_item as d where a.user_id =c.id and a.store_id = b.id and a.id=d.order_id and a.order_type=2000 ORDER BY a.addTime desc
